name: proportioned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having parts of the size or shape that is described: We wandered through the beautifully proportioned rooms of the Winter Palace. She has the dancer's finely proportioned physique.humorous The generously proportioned (= fat) singer has to have all his garments specially made.
